ref.mixed-citation: Ebola outbreak in Sierra Leone traced back to a single traditional healer's funeral where 14 women were infected. Available at: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2738904/Ebola-outbreak-Sierra-Leone-traced-single-traditional-healer-s-funeral-14-women-infected.html#ixzz3FlB1t4aG. Accessed December 2, 2014.
